main event: On August 5, 1962, an unidentified object or objects were observed in Bermuda, traveling at high speed from south to north.
interesting points: The sighting lasted between 15 to 20 minutes,The objects appeared very bright and round at an elevation of about 70 degrees,The objects showed no reflection or vapor trail and moved at tremendous speed,Witnesses included radio personnel observing from a radio tower construction site,The investigation indicated no balloons or aircraft in the area that could explain the sighting.
sighted object: three or one bright round objects
witness description: radio station owner and radio chief announcer
